meanings.definition: The quality or state of being warm.
meanings.sent1: The warmness of the sun on my face felt nice.
meanings.sent2: I love the warmness of a cozy blanket on a cold day.
meanings.sent3: The warmness of the fireplace made the room feel like a toasty hug.
meanings.sent4: Her smile radiated a warmness that lit up the entire room.
meanings.sent5: The warmness of his words melted away her worries like sunshine on snow.

meanings.sent1: The warmness of the room was perfect for a nap.
meanings.sent2: I adjusted the thermostat to increase the warmness in the house.
meanings.sent3: The warmness of the soup filled me with contentment on a chilly evening.
meanings.sent4: The warmness of the hot cocoa was like a hug in a mug.
meanings.sent5: The warmness of the fire pit drew everyone closer for stories and laughter.
